descriptions.emergencyBoost: This aircraft may exceed its maximum speed by 1, 2 or 3, but may not perform any hex turns or special maneuvers during this game round
descriptions.barrelRollBonus: If this aircraft attempts to perform the special maneuver 'Barrel Roll', it gets a bonus of 1 or 2 for its 2D6 dice roll result
descriptions.barrelRollPenalty: If this aircraft attempts to perform the special maneuver 'Barrel Roll', it suffers a penalty of 1 or 2 for its 2D6 dice roll result
descriptions.tightTurnPenalty: If this aircraft attempts to perform the special maneuver 'Tight Turn', it suffers a penalty of 1 or 2 for its 2D6 dice roll result
descriptions.tightTurnBonus: If this aircraft attempts to perform the special maneuver 'Tight Turn', it gets a bonus of 1 or 2 for its 2D6 dice roll result
descriptions.strafingBonus: This aircraft is very effective against ground targets. The strafing bonus is doubled (Firepower B: +2, C: +4, D: +6)
descriptions.diveBombDamage: This aircraft can perform dive bomb attacks and receives a bonus of 0, 1, 2 or 3 on the damage dice roll on the dive bomb table
descriptions.initiative: This aircraft receive a bonus of 1 on the initiative roll. This bonus can be used only once per game round, no matter how many aircraft there are with this bonus
descriptions.kamikaze: This aircraft can be perform kamikaze attacks. The aircraft is automatically destroyed with its kamikaze attack - regardless of whether the attack was successful or not
descriptions.hineriKomi: This aircraft can be perform the special maneuver 'Hineri-Komi'
descriptions.levelBombDamage: This aircraft can carry out level bombs attacks and receives a bonus of 0, 1, 2 or 3 on the damage dice roll on the level bomb table
descriptions.frontGunner: This aircraft is equipped with at least one front gunner that has a firepower A, B, C or D
descriptions.rearGunner: This aircraft is equipped with at least one rear gunner that has a firepower A, B, C or D
descriptions.turretGunner: This aircraft is equipped with at least one turret gunner that has a firepower A, B, C or D
descriptions.sideGunner: This aircraft is equipped with at least one side gunner that has a firepower A, B, C or D
descriptions.torpedoRange: This aircraft can carry out torpedo attacks and is equipped with a torpedo with range of 2, 3 or 4
descriptions.unreliable: This aircraft has an increased risk of technical problems and malfunctions. Roll 2D6 before the start of each movement phase: At 9 or more only normal speed is available in this game round and no special maneuvers are allowed
